def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_xyz_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_xyz_grey = all([is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_xyz_steam_logo = (
            is_above(y, x, ctx) and is_above(z, x, ctx)
            and is_right(y, x, ctx) and is_left(z, x, ctx)
            and is_below(y, z, ctx)
        )
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_xyz_large
            and check_xyz_grey
            and check_xyz_steam_logo
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):

    return state
